Text.Page:
It may be the excavation of Ger, or only the chance of a good fight that quickens 's heart. Whichever the case, our commander at Roostcliff Quarter was not happy with the last reinforcements we sent.

Dispatching a seasoned fighter such as may make Areish feel more kindly towards us.

What was Raynor thinking when he sent Elraine? "Better her than no one" he said.

Actually, no one would be an immense improvement. So as she will not do her job, shall have it.

Southeast of here are ruins we were working until the prions arrived. I want you to defeat their leaders, Veriksha and Narak, and thin their numbers a bit so we can return to our work.

You've done well, but I wonder how long your work will hold. Where there are prions, can Saleron be far away?

Gods and their schemes and us in the middle, as ever.
